title: Hello, there
name: Mustofa Ghaleb Amami
role: Tech Lead Fullstack & Software Engineering Lecturer
hero-description: Tech Team Lead at Deriv, specializing in building robust web platforms. Software Engineering Lecturer at RevoU, coaching aspiring engineers. Passionate about creating user-focused, high-performance web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Tech Team Lead at Deriv and Software Engineering Lecturer at RevoU. With expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Node.js, I lead web platform initiatives and mentor aspiring developers. I believe that creativity and understanding users are equally important as technical ability in building successful applications.
about.learning: Continuously learning new technologies like Kotlin, Flutter, Swift, Go, and Python while staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

what-i-do.title: What I Do
what-i-do.content: I lead web platform fullstack development at Deriv, driving initiatives like OAuth implementation and partner onboarding experiences. I also teach software engineering at RevoU, coaching hundreds of aspiring engineers. I specialize in React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern CSS frameworks.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.content: What my clients say about working with me.
testimonials.trusted: Trusted by clients and colleagues for delivering high-quality work and exceptional results.
testimonials.quote1: Mustofa is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are outstanding.
testimonials.quote2: Working with Mustofa was a pleasure. He's professional, reliable, and his technical expertise helped bring our vision to life.

clients.title: Clients
clients.content: Companies I've had the pleasure to work with.

cta.title: Ready to work together?
cta.description: Let's create something amazing together! I'm always excited to take on new challenges and bring innovative ideas to life.
